AzureBlade: Mmm... He is bulkier than I thought... I will bring him 
back in beast mode.

He transforms to dragon mode, ????? in his claws, and takes flight. He 
then turns to the two car.

AzureBlade: I will try not to go fast. Just follow me or Hot Rod.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Prowl/Hot Rod::
> 
> They looked at each other. 
> "Interesting past," they both said.
> "Ok, the Autobots will have to meat up with us at Maximal City, if 
they
> want to. We'll salvage your ship later," said Prowl.
> 
> Hot Rod gave the limp form of ?????? to Azure.
> "He is all yours."
> He then transformed to car mode.
> 
> "Prowl, beast mode."
> He transformed to his owl/raptor mode, and took flight.
> "Lets go home."
> 
> Both Prowl and Hot Rod took off for Maximal City.
> 
> ::Epyon/Skyburst::
> 
> They both picked up Nighstrike again.
> "Ok, off to the med bay," said Epyon.
> They continued on their way to the med bay.
